replies.msg:
#include <iostream>

extern int j = 0; //Ok

int main() {
    extern int i = 0;  //Error
    return 0;
}

想問下點解 initializer on an extern inside a function係錯.
同埋具體幾時同點樣用extern

http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2017/n4713.pdf

11.6 Initializers [dcl.init]
5 A declaration of a block-scope variable with external or internal linkage that has an initializer is ill-formed.

quote.msg:
http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2017/n4713.pdf

11.6 Initializers [dcl.init]
5 A declaration of a block-scope variable with external or internal linkage that has an initializer is ill-formed.

replies.msg:
#include <iostream>

extern int j; //should be defined elsewhere
int j = 10; //Definition

int main() {
    extern int i; // should be defined somewhere outside this function
    int i = 0; //  Error: redefinition
    return 0;
}

係咪可以咁理解

quote.msg:
http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2017/n4713.pdf

11.6 Initializers [dcl.init]
5 A declaration of a block-scope variable with external or internal linkage that has an initializer is ill-formed.

#include <iostream>

extern int j; //should be defined elsewhere
int j = 10; //Definition

int main() {
    extern int i; // should be defined somewhere outside this function
    int i = 0; //  Error: redefinition
    return 0;
}

係咪可以咁理解

replies.msg:
你個int i=0係redeclaration

另外
extern int i 已經declare左佢係static storage duration external linkage
所以你要係提供static storage duration既definition

quote.msg:
http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2017/n4713.pdf

11.6 Initializers [dcl.init]
5 A declaration of a block-scope variable with external or internal linkage that has an initializer is ill-formed.

#include <iostream>

extern int j; //should be defined elsewhere
int j = 10; //Definition

int main() {
    extern int i; // should be defined somewhere outside this function
    int i = 0; //  Error: redefinition
    return 0;
}

係咪可以咁理解

你個int i=0係redeclaration

另外
extern int i 已經declare左佢係static storage duration external linkage
所以你要係提供static storage duration既definition

replies.msg:
明晒
唔該晒手巴
